# Switch to a session
switch_session() {
  local session_name="$1"
  local session_dir="${SESSION_DIR}/${session_name}"
  
  if [ ! -d "$session_dir" ]; then
    echo "Session does not exist: $session_name"
    return 1
  fi
  
  echo "$session_name" > "$CURRENT_SESSION_FILE"
